description: Cancels a job run. A job run is a unit of work, such as a Spark jar, PySpark script, or SparkSQL query, that you submit to Amazon EMR on EKS.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job run to cancel.

parameters.name: virtualClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual cluster for which the job run will be canceled.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The output contains the ID of the cancelled job run.

nested_items.name: virtualClusterId
nested_items.description: The output contains the virtual cluster ID for which the job run is cancelled.
